name: Soap2day +
description:
Soap2dayPlus game covers some of the trending movies as well as old successful ones :
* Echer Level has a specific number (between 20 and 30 ) of soundtrack questions.
* Questions of each Level are updated monthy.
* To pass from a level to another you should have a score of 100% f the current level
* Listen to the soundtrack carefully before the choose the right response
* share your score with your friends.

Enjoy!
